TopicTitle: How can i install a map on KSP?

Articles.Content:
Hello pilots.

I have a question.

I have downloaded the manley air race (it is an air course), and now i want to know how i can install it.

If anyone can help me it would be great!

It's just a simple save file. Go to your installation folder, open the saves folder, make a new folder that you name race or whatever you like. Then copy the sfs file from the zip into the new folder and rename it persistent.sfs. Or make a new game from within the game, copy the sfs file into its folder and rename it to quicksave.sfs to load it as a quicksave. Loading it from an existing game will most likely overwrite any progress you made.
So you found Scott Manley's air race video. But did you watch it? He explains in detail how to install it.
